data.prayer: Father, help the 16,640 believers in Shajapur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 16,640 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Shajapur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, grace the churches in Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 16,640 believers in Shajapur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Alwar people. Make the Alwar people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Shajapur, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,512,700.

We estimate Shajapur has 16,640 people who might know Jesus, 18,354 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,477,706 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,477,706 lost people in  Shajapur, Madhya Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
